TopicTitle: A mod to control hidden/inaccesible parts during flight

Articles.Content:
Hi, if I'm not mistaken I once saw a mod that allowed to control those little parts that were hidden inside bigger parts, like antenas, science equipment, command drones, etc. Does anyone know a mod that does that? I couldn't find anything

Thanks

Can you expand on this as I'm not entirely sure what you are shooting at.  If for example you are talking about reliably extending a clipped antenna instead of having to hunt for an angle to select it through other parts, then just assign it to an action group and you are all set.

With that in mind, Action Groups Extended is what you are probably seeking.  If that's not what you were talking about then I'm happy to have another stab...

 

SM
I think that's the one your looking for :
That's the one, thanks!! Action groups are limited to the VAB level, so I have only the defaults wich I already use for the expected parts

9 hours ago, Li0n said:

Now there's a useful mod, thanks for pointing it out
